name: Espresso Emporium
description: A full-stack coffee store app with public coffee listings and secured admin features for adding, updating, and deleting items by logged-in users.

name: Subscription Box
description: A responsive subscription box site with themed products, protected routes, dynamic pages, and smooth animations.

name: Doc-Consult
description: Doctor appointment app with profile browsing, booking system, data visualization, and user authentication.

name: Cricket Dream Eleven
description: Fantasy cricket team builder with player selection, coin validation, toast notifications, and interactive features.

name: Auction Bidding Gallery
description: Auction bidding platform with dynamic item listings, real-time favorites tracking, bid price calculations, disabled actions after selection.

name: English Vocab Janala
description: A vocabulary learning app that features login, dynamic lessons, word modals, speech, smooth scroll, and SweetAlert2.
